description:
V or Vasuki is a secret organization that operates in the shadows and fulfills an agenda of maintaining a "balance" of the human and http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] societies. Their efforts to maintain this ostensible "equilibrium" have been failing because of the ghoul terrorist organization, http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri Tree], and its leader, the http://anidb.net/ch70055 [One-Eyed Owl]. The cabal is aiming to eliminate this faction because of the danger to its policy.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: V
